attributes.action: Allow students to go toilet during lessons
attributes.additional_details: I would like parliament to do this because accidents in school are terrible a inconvenience and to common. Children should not have to go through the embarrassment of it all
attributes.background: SIGN THIS ASAP In schools students have to sit down and learn but with some schools only having 50 minute break max when students need the toilet they can't go resulting in a lot of accidents I would like this all to change

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Require schools to allow students to have access to the toilet during lessons:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643422
